name: Breeze Apple Pleasure — Tic Tac — 2 * 26,9 g (53,8 g)
ingredients: Xylitol (94,8%), acidity regulators (malic acid, citric acid, tartaric acid), flavourings, thickener (gum arabic), anticaking agent (magnesium stearate), powdered apple, rice starch, colour (copper complexes of chlorophyllins).
additives:
E967 - Xilitolo
E296 - Acido malico
E330 - Acido citrico
E334 - L(+)-acido tartarico
E414 - Gomma d'acacia
E572 - Stearato di magnesio
E141ii - Complessi rameici delle clorofilline
Categorie: Cibi e bevande a base vegetale, Bevande, Cibi a base vegetale, Groceries, Condiments, Hot beverages, Plant-based beverages, Culinary plants, Herbal teas, Aromatic plants, Artificially sweetened beverages, Aromatic herbs, Mint
